New Records: Jackson Chourio hit four home runs in his last eight games to put himself on the cusp of 20/20
Key Match Events: Elvis Peguero surrendered three runs in the 12th and absorbed a loss in his return to the Majors
Willy Adames’ sinking line drive popped out for an RBI double and a 4-4 tie
Brice Turang bunted back to the mound, giving Liberatore an out at home and a path to escaping the inning after he intentionally walked Chourio
Paul Goldschmidt homered off Civale in the fourth
Chourio tied the game again in the fifth when he hit a two-out RBI double
Post-Match Reflections: You can credit the St. Louis pitching if you want because I think they did a really nice job
It’s under my skin, obviously. I take it maybe too personally
We faced some good pitching, too
